name: Blocks vs Snake Balls
description:
Tap to throw the color bricks to break the ball snake!
Try to break as many balls as possible before they move down to the bottom!
Get additional balls and make an endless gameplay!

The speed of the bricks will be more and more fast.It is very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores!

Game Features:
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Simple tap control
- Challenge your friends with the best highscore

Relax your brain with the champion of time killer! Enjoy it!
